mapper.select: SELECT MIN_SALARY AS minSalary , MAX_SALARY AS maxSalary FROM JOBS WHERE JOB_ID = #{id}

SELECT E.EMPLOYEE_ID AS empId , CONCAT(FIRST_NAME, ' ' || LAST_NAME) AS empName , CONCAT(E.EMAIL, '@emp.com') AS email , J.JOB_TITLE AS jobName , J.JOB_ID AS jobId , D.DEPARTMENT_NAME AS deptName , D.DEPARTMENT_ID AS deptId FROM EMPLOYEES E JOIN JOBS J ON E.JOB_ID = J.JOB_ID JOIN DEPARTMENTS D ON E.DEPARTMENT_ID = D.DEPARTMENT_ID WHERE E.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEES(EMPLOYEE_ID , FIRST_NAME , LAST_NAME , EMAIL , JOB_ID , DEPARTMENT_ID , HIRE_DATE) VALUES(#{empId} , SUBSTR(#{empName}, 1, INSTR(#{empName}, ' ') - 1) , SUBSTR(#{empName}, INSTR(#{empName}, ' ') + 1, LENGTH(#{empName})) , SUBSTR(#{email}, 1, INSTR(#{email}, '@') - 1) , #{jobId} , #{deptId} , SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT E.EMPLOYEE_ID AS empId , CONCAT(FIRST_NAME, ' ' || LAST_NAME) AS empName , CONCAT(E.EMAIL, '@emp.com') AS email , J.JOB_TITLE AS jobName , J.JOB_ID AS jobId , D.DEPARTMENT_NAME AS deptName , D.DEPARTMENT_ID AS deptId FROM EMPLOYEES E JOIN JOBS J ON E.JOB_ID = J.JOB_ID JOIN DEPARTMENTS D ON E.DEPARTMENT_ID = D.DEPARTMENT_ID

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EMPLOYEES E JOIN JOBS J ON E.JOB_ID = J.JOB_ID JOIN DEPARTMENTS D ON E.DEPARTMENT_ID = D.DEPARTMENT_ID
WHERE E.DEPARTMENT_ID = #{deptId}
